LanguageData.Deer.label: deer
LanguageData.Deer.description: A medium-sized herding herbivore. Generally peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.Deer_Leather.label: deerhide
LanguageData.Deer_Meat.label: venison
LanguageData.Deer_Corpse.label: deer corpse
LanguageData.Ibex.label: ibex
LanguageData.Ibex.description: The hardy wild ancestor of the domesticated goat. Ibexes live on marginal territory that most antelopes couldn't survive, eating lichens and sparse mountain plants. They're famous for dextrously hopping across bare cliff faces - and for their violent ramming attack.
LanguageData.Ibex_Leather.label: goathide
LanguageData.Ibex_Meat.label: ibex meat
LanguageData.Ibex_Corpse.label: ibex corpse
LanguageData.Elk.label: elk
LanguageData.Elk.description: A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates.
LanguageData.Elk_Leather.label: elkhide
LanguageData.Elk_Meat.label: elk meat
LanguageData.Elk_Corpse.label: elk corpse
LanguageData.Caribou.label: caribou
LanguageData.Caribou.description: A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates.
LanguageData.Caribou_Leather.label: caribou leather
LanguageData.Caribou_Meat.label: caribou meat
LanguageData.Caribou_Corpse.label: caribou corpse
LanguageData.WildBoar.label: wild boar
LanguageData.WildBoar.description: Although considered impure by some cultures, this hairy ancestor of the domesticated pig is prized for the gamey flavor of its meat.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Corpse.label: wild boar corpse
LanguageData.Tortoise.label: tortoise
LanguageData.Tortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite.
LanguageData.Tortoise_Leather.label: tortoise leather
LanguageData.Tortoise_Meat.label: tortoise meat
LanguageData.Tortoise_Corpse.label: tortoise corpse
